name: I broke the Controller!
description:
The game I broke the Controller! was made for the 1-Button Jam, a 8-days game-jam with the objective of creating a game using only one button to play.

In this game, you're controlling a car from above! Heavily inspired by TrackMania, your objective is to reach the finish line as fast as possible. Just beat time medals to unlock new tracks! 

Featuring:

  • 20 tracks to challenge yourself! Will you get all of the medals?
  • An auto-save system! Leave the game & come back later, your records and your medals will still be there!
  • Awesome controls!
  • Awesome soundtrack!
  • A multiplayer mode inspired by Micromachines, to challenge your friends! This is an incoming work, it will be available later... I hope so!
Controls:

Left arrow to rotate to the left, right arrow to rotate to the right, up arrow to move forward.

Well, it seems that I broke the controller, so now the car is moving forward all along, and you can only rotate to the right... I guess you will manage, right?
